name: Under the Brine
description:
There’s something off in this town, and the forest is one of them.  Your whole life flips upside down the day you stumble across a dead body at the beach that nobody seems to recognize. It’s up to you to find out what really happened and save him before it's too late. Support me! Twitter: 🌟ᗪOᑎᑎᗩ ᗪᖇᗩᗯS🌟 (@artist_donna) / Twitter Instagram: 🌟ᗪOᑎᑎᗩ ᗪᖇᗩᗯS🌟 (@donna.theartist.3) • Instagram

---------

  • Estimated gameplay time: 30-40 minutes
  • **VERY text heavy**
  • Click anywhere on the screen to progress the dialogue
  • Featured characters: Wilbur, Tommy, Quackity, Puffy, Techno

 ---------

Based on the fanfic by bonesandthebees on A03:

 https://archiveofourown.org/works/36881713/chapters/92014864

---------

4 different possibilities the game could end: 

- Lie to Puffy when she questions you  (bad ending)

- Don’t promise to save Tommy (bad ending)

-Turn left in the woods (bad ending)

-Complete the full story (good/true ending)

---------

This is my first ever game so it's not that complex, nonetheless I hope you enjoy it :)

Took 42 days to make
